content: it started with a miniature piece for the new baby when the little misses asked if i could make one for her doll too then she asked if i could make a third one in her size but off course darling let s throw in a few more sizes from doll/preemie size up to teen size and everything in between the hat is made with bulky fuzzy yarn and crochet hook 6mm and because i now have a wonderful team of pattern testers behind me i can inform you that this is a very quick project a few of the hats have been made within an hour so have fun with this little pattern
